DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the impact of a worksite lifestyle intervention for diabetes prevention among employees with prediabetes.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of a Lifestyle Intervention for Employees With Prediabetes
DOC.detailed_description: The lifestyle intervention includes a 16-week group-based program which targets weight reduction through the adoption of a lower fat diet and greater physical activity.
DOC.criteria: 1865 years old overweight or obese prediabetes with elevated glucose value recent cardiovascular event use of corticosteroids concurrent participation in a structured weight loss program pregnant or lactating
